channel.title: So
channel.description: I went to clan wars to use the fun portal, and in my invo was my dharoks, torso, all my gold, whip, my bgs, and hella bolts for ranging. I just wanted to have some fun. So i go in, kill a guy, then I die. Then I go back in, except I click on the red portal. I'm barraged, claw spec, and die, losing everything I own. Took me about 45 seconds to realize what happened. Shit like this ever happen to you?

item.title: So
item.dc:creator: @Anieli Anieli
item.description:
@Anieli wrote:

I remember spending all my 5m cash on an easter egg ages ago and I ate it 2 days later by accident when I was trying to sell it

Read full topic

item.title: So
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:29, topic:414395”]I never said it was about me.
I’m helping him understand it wasn’t such a loss, you can always get more money. Help him get over it, it’s the only option. He’s not getting it back.[/quote]
okay, next time say it that way then:L

Read full topic

item.title: So
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:29, topic:414395”][quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=516358.msg3764473#msg3764473 date=1317135009]

I’ve lost 2 santa hats, lol…
Your loss is absolutely nothing. Probably $40 of rsgp.

You’re bragging because you were stupid enough to lose more money than him? Doesn’t make sense to me.

I’m saying I lost 2 hats. I’m comparing to his loss and telling him it’s not so bad.
What do you want me to say? OH MY GOD WHAT A LOSS! RAGEQUIT LIFE - ONLY SOLUTION

Ok cool his loss isnt alot to you but its alot to him

+1 Also, this topic isn’t about you its about the person that died in the Red portal.
[/quote]

I never said it was about me.
I’m helping him understand it wasn’t such a loss, you can always get more money. Help him get over it, it’s the only option. He’s not getting it back.[/quote]

I stacked together shit in my bank to make 1m, bought a d axe, then quit from boredom

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

Reminds me of a time when I was afk for 5 minutes (before gravestones) and a random event appeared and killed me… drunken dwarf attacks when you don’t respond. FML was holding 10 mill. The newbs around me must of loved it.

Read full topic

item.title: So

item.description:
@EMINEM_BEAST wrote:

Well, actually the same thing happen to me awhile ago, but I was level 60 and I only lost full rune G and 1M cash… Doesn’t seem like a lot now, but back then it was a lot to me.

item.title: So
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:19, topic:414395”][quote author=mihalich link=topic=516358.msg3747791#msg3747791 date=1315792236]

Lol I have nothing left, is white berries a decent method?

not anymore i dont think it is

Well I’ve got a rune pickaxe… should I bot?

Yews

Eucalyptus is better now that yews are so heavily botted.

True
[/quote]

And one could find those wear?[/quote]

Just east of the mobilising armies place. A few of them are there, but I think there’s ogres or something that might attack if you chop the northern ones, so don’t afk.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

The quest I was doing was one small favour, I had to start the quest over again because I lost one of the items (anyone that has done the quest knows what I mean…)

Read full topic

item.title: So
item.dc:creator: @mihalich mihalich
item.description:
@mihalich wrote:

Davidi2:

Sounds like me when I died during a quest where I had 7m cash on me because I didn’t expect to die, but got killed by a wolf while AFK

Which reminds me of a time when I was doing a clue scroll… I always used to carry all my runes on me when I did clues (usually around 100k air/fire/earth/water and anywhere from 1-5k laws) and I had a wilderness clue and got my ass kicked by revs in the wild. Needless to say I was quite pissed.

Read full topic

I used to always log out when I went afk, but I don’t worry anymore because they removed things like evil chicken.
